lines.Speaker: Prince Charles
lines.Text: Hi Jane, looking funny as always

lines.Speaker: Prince Charles
lines.Text: Looking forward to tonight, can’t wait to hear your routine!

lines.Speaker: Jane
lines.Text: Yeah, it’s going to be great, really funny stuff coming. Cecily couldn’t contain herself earlier.

lines.Speaker: Prince Charles
lines.Text: Oh Cecily is coming? How come?

lines.Speaker: Jane
lines.Text: I invited her! William wanted me to. Aren’t you and William friends

lines.Speaker: Prince Charles
lines.Text: Ah yes, I am… Look forward to watching William make a fool of himself all night. Maybe he should take part in the comedy rather than you!

lines.Speaker: Jane
lines.Text: Leave it to the professionals, see you later.
